title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync error
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync error
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar file in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is shown when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The out of sync error should not occur when overwriting the exported jar file.
SR:
1. Open the project directory.
2. Export the project as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the project directory.
4. Overwrite the exported jar file with a new version.
5. Verify that the out of sync error is displayed.
